about_the_game:
ARBO: Arena Tactics is a sci-fi turn-based strategy game that puts players in the center of this intergalactic standoff - merging tactical combat between units in an interactive hextiled arena with decks of powerful cards that supplement their in-field abilities. The result is a fast-paced battle of wits with unlimited strategic depth, but without real-time pressure.

ENLIST IN THE WAR

Assume the role of a tactical Commander, leading your Squads of highly-adaptive Heroes in combat against friends and ranked opponents in PvP matches, or take on the game’s A.I. in PvE matches.

FRACTURED FACTIONS

Assemble your Squads from four different Hero Classes, each with its own unique set of skills and tools - humanity’s tanky, terraforming Worldforgers, the Syhm’s stealthy, chaos-slinging Specters, the Abyssals’ bloodthirsty, gravity-bending Reavers, and the ARBO’s celestial, monk-like Archons - offering an unlimited number of possible combinations, combat strategies, and playstyles.

BUILD YOUR ARSENAL

Supply your Heroes with a customized Deck of powerful Protocol Cards, which leverage your Squad’s Energy reserves for special high-risk/high-reward powers. Summon swarms of mighty Minions, equip fearsome Weapons for bonus firepower, and lead enemies into your carefully laid traps.

OUTTHINK, OUTMANEUVER

Should you rush your enemy’s Base or hunt down their Squad one-by-one? Or dig your heels in to defend your own Squad and Base? Round after unpredictable Round, every fight in ARBO: Arena Tactics feels like a boss fight, chock-full of pulse-pounding possibilities.

STAKE EPIC COMEBACKS

As your Heroes fall in battle, your team’s Protocols get cheaper, allowing you to smartly chain them together for exciting combos that can suddenly turn the tides of war back in your favor.

A MODERN STRATEGY CLASSIC

Inspired by the ferocious, warring factions of RTS games as well as the irresistible theorycrafting of TCGs, the result is an edge-of-your-seat combat experience that seems vaguely familiar yet unlike anything that’s come before. ARBO: Arena Tactics recaptures the magic of a bygone era in strategy gaming while setting a new standard as the ever-evolving “chess” of sci-fi tactics games.
